title: Darkest Dungeon 2 Tier List
description: Discover the top heroes in Darkest Dungeon 2 with our comprehensive tier list, detailing strengths and optimal team roles.
heading: Darkest Dungeon 2 Tier List
introText: Discover the top heroes in Darkest Dungeon 2 with our comprehensive tier list, detailing strengths and optimal team roles.

data.itemDescription: The Resident Healer. Serving as a reliable backline support, the Plague Doctor specializes in applying blight damage and healing allies. Her ability to cure ailments and provide area-of-effect attacks makes her a valuable asset

Hurt Through Getting Hurt. A resilient hero who thrives under pressure. The Flagellant can endure significant damage, heal himself and allies, and inflict bleed effects on enemies. His potential shines in prolonged battles

The Universal Frontlin Tank. An exceptionally versatile hero with a robust skill set. He can deal significant damage, protect allies, and has self-sustain capabilities. His adaptability makes him invaluable in various team compositions

Set Up Combos From Any Position. A dynamic damage dealer proficient in both melee and ranged attacks. The Highwayman offers strong offensive capabilities and can adapt to different combat scenarios with ease
Flexible Tank For Plugging Gaps In Offense, Defense

Flexible Kit Needs Support To Perform. A nimble and versatile hero capable of inflicting blight damage and utilizing stealth. The Grave Robber excels in critical strikes and can target enemies in various positions, making her a flexible choice

Deal Damage Through Self-Harm. A hero with a mix of offensive and support abilities, including debuffs and healing. The Occultist's performance can be unpredictable due to variable healing outcomes and reliance on specific conditions

A Literal Stress Relief Tank. A formidable frontliner known for her high damage output. The Hellion can target multiple ranks, including backline enemies, and possesses self-buffing abilities to enhance her combat effectiveness
Decent Performer When Combo Tempo Is Understood

An Extremely Flexible Buffer, Debuffer. A dedicated healer with abilities to support and sustain the team. The Vestal offers direct healing, defensive buffs, and can illuminate enemies, reducing their resistances

A Tank With Decent Survivability. A powerful melee combatant with high health and damage potential. The Leper can withstand substantial damage and deliver devastating blows, though he may require support to manage his accuracy and debuffs

Deal Stealthy Damage Over Time. A character focusing on burn damage and mobility. The Runaway can apply fire-based attacks and reposition herself, but may struggle with consistency and overall impact compared to other heroes
